title: Moratorium on benefit enhancements
context: [ยง88-99] Moratorium on benefit enhancements. There shall be no benefit enhancements under this chapter for any group of members, including any reduction of retirement age, until such time as the actuarial value of the system&rsquo;s assets is one hundred per cent of the system&rsquo;s actuarial accrued liability. [L 2011, c 29, ยง2]
